title: Topic 001 Question 406
body: A systems administrator was attempting to launch a new Amazon EC2 instance with an encrypted boot volume using a new AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer managed key. The EC2 console initially stated the launch was successful, but the instance was subsequently terminated. The IAM role used by the system administrator has the following IAM permissions:
/Amazon AWS Certified Security - Specialty Exam Practice Questions/img/image22.png
Which IAM permission is the systems administrator missing?
